# Nuxt Docs Template

> A template for building documentation with Nuxt UI and Nuxt Content.

## Documentation Sets

- [Nuxt Docs Template - Full Documentation](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev//llms-full.txt): This is the full documentation for the Nuxt Docs Template.

## Getting Started

- [Introduction](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started): Welcome to Bruin University.
